concept: Childhood SES influences adult subjective wellbeing
source_title: Childhood Socioeconomic Status and Adult Subjective Wellbeing: The Role of Hope and Sense of Control
notes: Structural equation model shows SES effects mediated by hope/control; supports H1 framing of classchild vs h33e6gg.

concept: Childhood food security and cardiometabolic outcomes
source_title: Abstract 4136977: Childhood Food Security and Cardiometabolic Health in Young Adulthood
notes: Longitudinal cohort links early food insecurity to young-adult CKM risk; frames nutrition covariates for wellbeing study.

concept: Childhood environments predict adult mental wellbeing
source_title: From Childhood Residential Green Space to Adult Mental Wellbeing: A Pathway Analysis among Chinese Adults
notes: Highlights pathways from childhood context to adult mental wellbeing, motivating H4 anxiety-happiness explorations.
